name: Fitness & Wellness
description: Activities focused on physical fitness and well-being.

name: Team Sports
description: Sports played in teams, promoting teamwork and strategy.

name: Aquatic Sports
description: Water-based activities including swimming and water polo.

name: Martial Arts
description: Disciplined combat sports and self-defense techniques.

name: Racquet Sports
description: Sports involving racquets such as tennis and badminton.

name: Extreme Sports
description: Adrenaline-pumping activities such as rock climbing and parkour.
